name: Stamina Drills
description: Develop endurance and control for high-intensity Jumpstyle and Hardstyle performances.

cards.title: Tempo Control Drill
cards.description: Adjust speed and energy levels to build long-lasting endurance.
bulletpoints: Start slow and gradually increase tempo
Focus on controlled breathing to avoid fatigue
Use arm movements to maintain overall balance

cards.title: Non-Stop Kick Combo
cards.description: A continuous cycle of Jumpstyle kicks to improve stamina and consistency.
bulletpoints: Perform alternating kicks for a set duration
Maintain form even as fatigue sets in
Increase complexity by adding knee lifts or spins
